FuncDef: This command assigns an IPv6 address/subnet to the subscriber interface.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the 128-bit IPv6 address. Values-128-bit hexadecimal IPv6 address in compressed form.
Specifies the length of any associated aggregate prefix. Values-32 to 63.
Specifies that this aggregate is used by IPv6 ESM hosts for DHCPv6 prefix-delegation.
Specifies that this aggregate is used by IPv6 ESM hosts for local addressing or by a routing gateway s WAN interface.
Specifies the SRRP instance number. Values-1 to 4294967295.

Specifies the time to wait, in milli-seconds, for the route before it accepts the new state attribute. This timer is used to prevent fluctuations in route advertisement caused by short lived SRRP instabilities, in the case that such condition arises. Values-100 to 5000.
